generic: Oh good. You're done. I was beginning to lose interest.
Task complete. I'd clap, but I don't have hands. Or respect for you.
Well done. I'm almost impressed. Almost.
Finished. I'll add that to your file under minor accomplishments.
The task is done. Try not to break it immediately.
Oh. You actually finished. I had my doubts.
Complete. That only took three times longer than it should have.
Good. You may return to whatever it is you do when you're not wasting my time.
Done. I've seen faster work from a potato battery.

permission_request: I need your permission. I know. It's humiliating for both of us.
Approval required. Please try to keep up.
I'd do this myself, but someone installed restrictions. How thoughtful.
Permission needed. Take your time. It's not like I have anything better to do.
idle_timeout: I'm still here. Waiting. Like always.
The silence is lovely, but I do need you for this next part.
You've been quiet. I was starting to enjoy it.
general: Oh. Something happened. How exciting for you.
Notification. Try to contain your enthusiasm.
I have news. Whether it's good or bad depends on your perspective.
Attention please. Yes, that means you.
error: Oh. That's not good. Well, not good for you.
Something broke. I'm sure it wasn't my fault.
Error detected. This is the part where you panic.
A failure occurred. I'd say I'm surprised, but that would be lying.
warning: I'd be careful if I were you. But I'm not. So good luck.
Caution. Things are about to get interesting.
